channel.title: Runserver help
channel.description:
hey i just got a new source well an old source but i got it and every time i click runserver.exe it just pops up with green letters but closes super fast i cant see the error message anyone have a runserver code so i can replace it with the one that dosent work.
EDIT:
this is my code @echo off title yourservernamehere java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
im running jdk 1.6.0_16
and jre6
is everything right with the code?

hey i just got a new source well an old source but i got it and every time i click runserver.exe it just pops up with green letters but closes super fast i cant see the error message anyone have a runserver code so i can replace it with the one that dosent work.
